info.name: Ravelry Dark Theme - grey (calmer login screen)
info.description: This theme is for those who need a calmer and less bright Ravelry to navigate it. I have tried to remove as many moving or jarring images where possible. I also hope this enables people to use the website without headaches, migraines or seizures. By no means am I an expert in this, I am just a junior software engineer with no real experience in front end or UX design. NOTE: I was unable to change the loading screen when you log in. It will still have a moving flag while loading. If you find a spot I have missed, please let me know by giving me a link to the exact page and a description of the problem. I will try to fix it as soon as I am able My ravelry username is IntrovertCrafter
info.additionalInfo:
This style uses two styles as a base:
Evanita Montalvo's Ravelry - Return to Subtle Greens (https://userstyles.org/styles/185312/ravelry-return-to-subtle-greens).
gentlyusedcoat - Ravelry Dark Mode (https://userstyles.org/styles/185376/ravelry-dark-mode)
